name: Dark Desire Mute 7
description:
Dark Desire Mute 7


This VISUAL NOVEL continues the life of the girls in the Cindy universe, even at different ages. This way you can explore all kind of kinks and pleasures and topics. This complex story includes also the life of Stephanie, Michelle, Monica, etc.

There are critical decisions and different paths to take, as well as the outfits options. Choose different outfits where possible.
Sound effects (may) have been added: door open, door close, air conditioning, slap, spank. ambient music or ambient sounds, etc.

More episodes with Cindy, Michelle, Stephanie, Beth, Jeff, Gina, etc.

Introducing:
  • Rendering done with depth of field and 3-point lightning, effects added in image processing software (= a lot of work for quality)
  • Side Stories - mini fun dialogue
  • Walking - jut like in RPG the characters take walks and talk or give you the chance to explore more of the story
  • Big and complex paths
  • Some animations
  • First person view Cindy (1st POV) or Third person view Cindy (3rd POV)
  • Different color schemes
  • Respond to dialogue
  • A lor of outfits to choose from
  • Groups of people talking / interacting
  • Fashion mini games
  • Dress up - different paths
